list.title: Light Docs MD
list.description: A very light documentation visualization website which is generated directly from the github repo, no extra config required.

list.title: Blog
list.description: The beginning of a soon to be legit blog of coding tutorials for beginners. Hosted on Light Docs :P

list.title: WebApp Hoster
list.description: Traefik configurations required to get all my sites certified and running on one server.

list.title: Goodnight
list.description: A google voicekit application to optimize my bedtime ritual and actually get to bed ontime. Ironically I spent multiple days up to 3am writing this.

list.title: MakeToMove
list.description: A giant geodesic dome which was created to encourage people to stop sitting and start moving.

list.title: KeyboardMario
list.description: A python program which listens to the event of keypress in archlinux, and plays a note in the mario song for each event.

list.title: CalendarToImage
list.description: My first personal project: a python and autohotkey script which auto opens, screenshots, and crops my google calendar (on windows xp) to perfectly fit my ipod nano. Ah good ol' days

list.title: Life Economy
list.description: Regulate your life with fake currency.

list.title: Professor Ciaraldi's Jokes
list.description: A compilation of a WPI professor well known for his jokes. If you have any more send them my way ;)

list.title: Lei's Scavenger Hunt
list.description: A site made for secret santa scavenger hunt where I hid the present in pieces around the office.

list.title: OneArmBand (1st)
list.description: A project where we had various devices linked together through a server in order to make music and notes from one arm

list.title: HoloSense (Best use of Spacial Sound)
list.description: Made echolocation app which allows you to walk around indoors without a cane with a hololens.

list.title: Dr. AllerG (2nd and most liked)
list.description: A google assistant app that tells you whether or not you can eat a certain food

list.title: alphaStep
list.description: A webapp which can teach you to write any Unicode letter or letters, meaning any font and any lanaguage.
